images.mining.segmentation

Interface SegmentationInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SRMSegmentation

    public interface SegmentationInterface
    This interface is to be implemented by classes that represent image segmentation methods.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Color getAverageColorForSegment(int segmentIndex)
      Calculate the average color in a segment.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> getAverageSegmentColors()
      Calculate a list of average colors for all image segments.
      int getNumberOfSegments() 
      int[][] getSegmentation()
      Obtain the current image segmentation.
      java.awt.Image getSegmentedImage()
      Generate an image that is the segmented image.
      void segment()
      Perform image segmentation.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfSegments

        int getNumberOfSegments()
        Returns:
        The number of segments produced by the segmentation.

      • getSegmentation

        int[][] getSegmentation()
        Obtain the current image segmentation.
        Returns:
        Integer 2D array, where the (x,y) holds the index of the segment to which the corresponding image pixel belongs.

      • getAverageColorForSegment

        java.awt.Color getAverageColorForSegment(int segmentIndex)
        Calculate the average color in a segment.
        Parameters:
        segmentIndex - Index of the specified segment.
        Returns:
        Color object holding the average color in the segment.

      • getAverageSegmentColors

        java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> getAverageSegmentColors()
        Calculate a list of average colors for all image segments.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of average segment colors.

      • getSegmentedImage

        java.awt.Image getSegmentedImage()
        Generate an image that is the segmented image.
        Returns:
        Image that is the segmented image according to the current segmentation.

      • segment

        void segment()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform image segmentation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
